headline.main: MOBILIZE TO FIGHT NEUTRALITY SHIFT; Non-Interventionist Senators Plan to Resist Any Changes Proposed by Roosevelt

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Sept. 27 (AP) -- Opponents of the Administration's foreign policy are organizing for a fight against revision of the Neutrality Act, and Senator La Follette made it clear today that opposition Senators would resist any changes.
snippet: WASHINGTON, Sept. 27 (AP) -- Opponents of the Administration's foreign policy are organizing for a fight against revision of the Neutrality Act, and Senator La Follette made it clear today that opposition Senators would resist any changes....
